verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Consecrate|strong="H6942"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Me|strong="H3605"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w male|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 13:2 \ft Cited in Luke 2:23\f* \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w* \w among|strong="H1060"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Me|strong="H3605"\w*, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* beast.”

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* told \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, “\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w slavery|strong="H5650"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w strength|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w leavened|strong="H2557"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* eaten.

\w Today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Abib,\f + \fr 13:4 \ft Abib was the first month of the ancient Hebrew lunar calendar, usually occurring within the months of March and April.\f* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w leaving|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w brings|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, Amorites, \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*—\w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* \w with|strong="H2100"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*—\w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H5647"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* eat \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* eaten \w during|strong="H3117"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*. \w Nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w leavened|strong="H2557"\w* \w may|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* found \w among|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w leaven|strong="H7603"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* found \w anywhere|strong="H3605"\w* within \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w explain|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, ‘\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w because|strong="H5668"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.’

\w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sign|strong="H2146"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w reminder|strong="H2146"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* forehead \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w lips|strong="H6310"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H2063"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w year|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w year|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w brings|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gives|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers,

\w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H6363"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H6363"\w* \w males|strong="H2145"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* livestock \w belong|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w break|strong="H6202"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w neck|strong="H6202"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* future, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w asks|strong="H7592"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w does|strong="H4100"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* mean?’ \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* tell \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, ‘\w With|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1121"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w slavery|strong="H5650"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w stubbornly|strong="H7185"\w* \w refused|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* beast. \w This|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.’

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w serve|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sign \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* symbol \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* forehead, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mighty \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.” The Pillars of Cloud and Fire

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lead|strong="H5148"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w along|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w through|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* shorter. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* said, “\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w face|strong="H7200"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w might|strong="H6435"\w* \w change|strong="H5162"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w minds|strong="H5162"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5927"\w* God \w led|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w around|strong="H5437"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w*.\f + \fr 13:18 \ft Or the Sea of Reeds\f* \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w left|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* arrayed \w for|strong="H4714"\w* \w battle|strong="H2571"\w*.\f + \fr 13:18 \ft LXX left the land of Egypt in the fifth generation\f*

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w made|strong="H7650"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w solemn|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said, “God \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w attend|strong="H6485"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w then|strong="H2088"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w carry|strong="H5927"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H2088"\w*.”\f + \fr 13:19 \ft Genesis 50:25\f*

They \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w* \w and|strong="H4057"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* Etham \w on|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H2583"\w* \w edge|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w the|strong="H2583"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w guide|strong="H5148"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w to|strong="H1980"\w* give \w them|strong="H6440"\w* light \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w could|strong="H3915"\w* \w travel|strong="H1980"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* \w or|strong="H3915"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w by|strong="H6051"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* fire \w by|strong="H6051"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w left|strong="H4185"\w* \w its|strong="H6051"\w* place \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
